spec_data.Name: perl-CGI-Application-Plugin-AutoRunmode
spec_data.Description:
This plugin for CGI::Application provides easy ways to setup run modes. You
can just write the method that implement a run mode, you do not have to
explicitly register it with CGI::App anymore.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 08:03:24 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: CGI::App plugin to automatically register runmodes
